credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Knife
description: The blade with lower edge tapering towards the point, plain bolster. Brassferrule, doubly waisted with a plain octagonal moulding engraved with geometrical pattern. Tapering handle, octagonal in section, mother-of-pearlwith engraved scrolled foilage, rounded top with writhen knob finial of brass.
name: Knife
